short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It can quickly summarize and generalize web page content in the specified language to improve reading efficiency.
short.zh_CN: 可以按照指定语言对网页内容进行快速总结归纳，提供阅读效率。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By integrating an advanced large language model (LLM), this extension can automatically capture the text content of the current web page and quickly generate a concise and clear summary according to the language specified by the user, allowing you to easily understand the main idea of the article without reading word by word.
Main functions:
Multilingual support: According to the needs of users, web page content can be summarized into multiple languages, suitable for global users.
One-click summary: With just one click, a concise summary of the required content can be generated, greatly improving reading efficiency.
Intelligent recognition: Automatically detect the main content on the web page, filter out advertisements and irrelevant information to ensure high-quality summaries.
Usage instructions:
Before use, you need to apply for a free API key at https://console.groq.com/keys.
Right-click on the application icon and select "Extension Options" to enter the API key.
long.zh_CN:
通过集成先进的大语言模型（LLM），该扩展能够自动抓取当前网页的文本内容，并根据用户指定的语言快速生成简洁明了的总结，让您轻松了解文章主旨，无需逐字阅读。

主要功能
多语言支持：可根据用户的需求，将网页内容总结成多种语言，适合全球用户。
一键总结：只需轻轻一击，即可生成所需内容的简洁总结，大幅提升阅读效率。
智能识别：自动检测网页上的主要内容，过滤广告和不相关信息，确保总结的高质量。

使用须知:
1.使用前需要在https://console.groq.com/keys申请一个免费的api key
2.右键点击应用图标，选择"扩展选项"，输入api key.
